thread.title: Mahesh Babu's Brahmotsavam picks up steam
thread.title_full: Mahesh Babu's Brahmotsavam picks up steam - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Mahesh Babu's Brahmotsavam picks up steam
text: The first schedule of Mahesh Babu's upcoming film Brahmotsavam was wrapped up a few days ago. A family song featuring the principal cast was canned in this schedule and sources close to us reveal that a mammoth 3.5 crores was spent to shoot this lavish number. Reports further reveal that Mahesh Babu will be be introduced through this song in the film. Touted to be an out and out family entertainer, the film is being directed by SVSC fame Srikanth Addala. Samantha, Kajal Aggarwal and Pranitha Subhash are the female leads.
